```{r, echo=FALSE}
coefs <- matrix(c(1,2,-1,2,1,1,-3,-3,0),3)
values <- matrix(c(5,13,-8),3,1)
round(coefs,values)
```
 

Multiply Matrices A and B: AB

```{r, echo=FALSE}
A <- matrix(c(4,-3,0,-3,5,1),3)
B<-matrix(c(1,3,4,-2),2)
A
B
A %*% B
```
